task.title: Adding users to the default administrative group

taskbody.context: This procedure adds users to the default administrative group of , wheel. Performing this procedure enables users with superuser privileges to gain access to the browser interface.

context.note: Perform this procedure or the next procedure, but not both.

step.cmd: Add users to the system group, wheel.

stepxmp.p: Replace User with the name of a login account on the master host.

step.info: Repeat the preceding command for each user to add.

info.note: For information about using Pluggable Authentication Modules (PAM), refer to your operating system documentation.
